assignment3.chessview.moves

Interface Move

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MultiPieceMove
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Castling, Check, EnPassant, NonCheck, PawnPromotion, SinglePieceMove, SinglePieceTake

    public interface Move
    A move is any move which is permitted by either the white or black player. This includes simple moves (where pieces just take on new positions), take moves (where a piece is taken as well), and check moves (where the opponent is put into check)
    Author:
    djp

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(Board board)
      Update the board to reflect the board after the move is played.
      boolean isValid(Board board)
      Check whether this move is valid or not.
      boolean isWhite()
      Is this move for white or black?
